Content: as someone diagnosed_ I believe that self diagnosis can be harmful in most cases_ but can also be a starting point for those who want an official diagnosis

there are psychological screening resources available online_ and as long as you aren’t like “I have depression_ ADD_ BPD_ EDNOS_ autism_ and eight more!!! 🤪😤” then it’s certainly okay to use self-diagnosing activities or questionnaires to seek for an actual diagnosis
AGREED I had OCD tendencies back when my anxiety was a lot worse and they are terrifying and exhausting_ not at all “hehe my pencils gotta be in color order :3)
